blueprint.name: interactive-iso-userkickstart
blueprint.description: Blueprint for ISO builds with custom kickstart contents that create a user account in %post (not unattended).

kickstart.contents:
%post

echo "=== Custom user kickstart ==="

echo -e "%sudo\tALL=(ALL)\tNOPASSWD: ALL" > "/etc/sudoers.d/%sudo"
chmod 0440 /etc/sudoers.d/%sudo
echo -e "%wheel\tALL=(ALL)\tNOPASSWD: ALL" > "/etc/sudoers.d/%wheel"
chmod 0440 /etc/sudoers.d/%wheel
restorecon -rvF /etc/sudoers.d
%end
